metadata.synopsis: A drow commander telepathically communicates with players who have allied with her to slaughter the inhabitants of a druid's grove

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *A splinter of ice works its way into your mind.*
3.context: NodeContext: describing the sensation of a drow telepathically communicating with us

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.context: NodeContext: speaking telepathically (we do not see her, only hear her); a command

2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
2.text: Exquisite work, True Soul. Now we must make sure nothing is hidden in their lair. Join me there.
2.context: NodeContext: speaking telepathically (we do not see her, only hear her); a command

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: The way is clear. Now we can cleanse this place completely. Kill everyone.
0.context: NodeContext: speaking telepathically (we do not see her, only hear her); a command
